column4: Someone please help me with my graphics issues.  I am using Intel Mobile 945GM/GMS/940GML Extreme as my graphics engine but when I play games it dosn't work up to code.  Are their special drivers for Ubuntu that I need to be aware of?
that's not really a linux question.  It's an X11 (Xorg) question.
I'm just saying this isn't really the obscure hardware expert area for X11 servers.
